from fractions import gcd
t=int(raw_input())
while(t):
  n,q=map(int,raw_input().split())
  a=map(int,raw_input().split())
  low, high = [0], [0]
  for _ in a:
      low.append(gcd( _, low[-1]))
  for _ in reversed(a):
      high.append(gcd( _, high[-1]))
  high.reverse()
  for _ in range(q):
      l, r = map(int, raw_input().split())
      print gcd(low[l - 1], high[r])
  t-=1
